languages.text: "Касаясь вопроса священной десятины, мы опираемся на факты, а не ваши слова. Факт подготовки хищения со стороны Теодоры установлен. Факт уничтожения Летуса тоже. Даровать вам возможность завершить свой план было бы в высшей степени неосмотрительно".

"On the matter of the sacred tithe, we rely on facts, not your words. That Theodora planned to steal the tithe is established fact. The destruction of Leethus is also beyond dispute. To allow you to execute your plan would have been highly imprudent."
languages.original_text: "Касаясь вопроса священной десятины, мы опираемся на факты, а не ваши слова. Факт подготовки хищения со стороны Теодоры установлен. Факт уничтожения Летуса тоже. Даровать вам возможность завершить свой план было бы в высшей степени неосмотрительно".

"On the matter of the sacred tithe, we rely on facts, not your words. That Theodora planned to steal the tithe is established fact. The destruction of Leethus is also beyond dispute. To allow you to execute your plan would have been highly imprudent."

languages.text: "Was den heiligen Zehnt angeht, verlassen wir uns auf Fakten, nicht auf Eure Worte. Dass Theodora den Zehnt stehlen wollte, ist eine Tatsache. Die Zerstörung von Leethus steht ebenfalls außer Frage. Es wäre ausgesprochen leichtsinnig gewesen, Euch Euren Plan ausführen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "On the matter of the sacred tithe, we rely on facts, not your words. That Theodora planned to steal the tithe is established fact. The destruction of Leethus is also beyond dispute. To allow you to execute your plan would have been highly imprudent."

traits.locale_text: "Was den heiligen Zehnt angeht, verlassen wir uns auf Fakten, nicht auf Eure Worte. Dass Theodora den Zehnt stehlen wollte, ist eine Tatsache. Die Zerstörung von Leethus steht ebenfalls außer Frage. Es wäre ausgesprochen leichtsinnig gewesen, Euch Euren Plan ausführen zu lassen."

languages.text: « Concernant la dîme sacrée, nous nous appuyons sur des faits, pas sur vos dires. Que Théodora ait eu l'intention de voler la dîme est un fait établi. La destruction de Leethus ne souffre pas non plus de la moindre discussion. Vous permettre de mettre votre plan en œuvre eut été très imprudent. »
languages.original_text: "On the matter of the sacred tithe, we rely on facts, not your words. That Theodora planned to steal the tithe is established fact. The destruction of Leethus is also beyond dispute. To allow you to execute your plan would have been highly imprudent."

traits.locale_text: « Concernant la dîme sacrée, nous nous appuyons sur des faits, pas sur vos dires. Que Théodora ait eu l'intention de voler la dîme est un fait établi. La destruction de Leethus ne souffre pas non plus de la moindre discussion. Vous permettre de mettre votre plan en œuvre eut été très imprudent. »

languages.text: “在神圣什一税的问题上，我们不看态度，只看事实。西奥多拉密谋盗取什一税是既定事实，利瑟斯的毁灭也没有任何争议。是我们放任你执行这个邪恶计划，我们当初的决定实在是太草率了。”
languages.original_text: "On the matter of the sacred tithe, we rely on facts, not your words. That Theodora planned to steal the tithe is established fact. The destruction of Leethus is also beyond dispute. To allow you to execute your plan would have been highly imprudent."

traits.locale_text: “在神圣什一税的问题上，我们不看态度，只看事实。西奥多拉密谋盗取什一税是既定事实，利瑟斯的毁灭也没有任何争议。是我们放任你执行这个邪恶计划，我们当初的决定实在是太草率了。”

languages.text: «En cuanto al sagrado diezmo, nos referimos a los hechos, no a sus palabras. Que Theodora planeara robar el diezmo es un hecho demostrado. La destrucción de Leethus tampoco admite discusión. Permitir que llevara a cabo su plan habría sido extremadamente imprudente».
languages.original_text: "On the matter of the sacred tithe, we rely on facts, not your words. That Theodora planned to steal the tithe is established fact. The destruction of Leethus is also beyond dispute. To allow you to execute your plan would have been highly imprudent."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto al sagrado diezmo, nos referimos a los hechos, no a sus palabras. Que Theodora planeara robar el diezmo es un hecho demostrado. La destrucción de Leethus tampoco admite discusión. Permitir que llevara a cabo su plan habría sido extremadamente imprudente».

languages.text: 「聖なる租税に関して、私たちが信頼するのはあなたの言葉ではなく、事実です。シオドーラが租税の窃盗を企てていたことは、すでに確立された事実です。リーザスの壊滅もまた、疑いようのない事実です。あなたに計画を実行させることは、極めて軽率な行いでした」
languages.original_text: "On the matter of the sacred tithe, we rely on facts, not your words. That Theodora planned to steal the tithe is established fact. The destruction of Leethus is also beyond dispute. To allow you to execute your plan would have been highly imprudent."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる租税に関して、私たちが信頼するのはあなたの言葉ではなく、事実です。シオドーラが租税の窃盗を企てていたことは、すでに確立された事実です。リーザスの壊滅もまた、疑いようのない事実です。あなたに計画を実行させることは、極めて軽率な行いでした」

languages.text: "Söz konusu kutsal aşar olduğunda lafa değil, gerçeklere bakılır. Theodora'nın aşarı çalma planı gün gibi ortadadır. Leethus'ın yok olduğu da tartışılmazdır. Bu gerçekler ışığında oturup harekete geçmeni bekleyecek hâlimiz yoktu."
languages.original_text: "On the matter of the sacred tithe, we rely on facts, not your words. That Theodora planned to steal the tithe is established fact. The destruction of Leethus is also beyond dispute. To allow you to execute your plan would have been highly imprudent."

traits.locale_text: "Söz konusu kutsal aşar olduğunda lafa değil, gerçeklere bakılır. Theodora'nın aşarı çalma planı gün gibi ortadadır. Leethus'un yok olduğu da tartışılmazdır. Bu gerçekler ışığında oturup harekete geçmeni bekleyecek hâlimiz yoktu."
